snippet: PERLMAN--Dr. Anthony. On June 1, 2016, Dr. Anthony Perlman, pediatrician and cardiologist from Baltimore, MD; loving husband of Patsy Perlman (nee Miller); cherished father of Daniel, Dr. Eric, and Ellen Perlman; adored grandfather of six. For service details, please go to www.sollevinson.com. Contributions in Tony's memory may be sent to The Associated: Jewish Community Federation of Baltimore. 1/3
